data.eml:eml: The first Strigocis Dury (Coleoptera, Ciidae) from the southern Neotropical region and a provisional key to world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano (2011): The first Strigocis Dury (Coleoptera, Ciidae) from the southern Neotropical region and a provisional key to world species. ZooKeys 81: 27-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.81.940, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.81.940
